import React, { useState } from "react" import '../../node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; const Form = () => { const [currencies, setCurrency] = useState([ {name:'Ether', address:'0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000' }, {name:'WBTC', address:'0xD1B98B6607330172f1D991521145A22BCe793277' }, {name:'LINK', address:'0xa36085F69e2889c224210F603D836748e7dC0088' }, ]) return (
) } export default Form
